description: Bridges: The bridge interface has incorrect method signature for `recalculateOrder()`. Missed return type. That violates the rule "All bridge interface methods must have exactly the same or more strict signature as their parent"
Bridges: Method `get()` must have `public function get<DomainEntity>Collection(<DomainEntity>CriteriaTransfer): <DomainEntity>CollectionTransfer` signature.
Bridges: Method `findOrderByIdSalesOrder()` must have `public function get<DomainEntity>Collection(<DomainEntity>CriteriaTransfer): <DomainEntity>CollectionTransfer` signature.
